price: Sa'an nan kada ku bãyar da waɗansu misãlai ga Allah. Lalle ne Allah Yanã sani, kuma kũ, ba ku sani ba.
arabic: فَلَا تَضۡرِبُواْ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falā taḍribū lillahi al-amthāla inna al-laha yaʿlamu wa-antum lā taʿlamūna
